textBeforeTable: Playlist Tracks:  The second hour of the program contains a wide variety of French music, both new and old Arnaud, a rising young (25) baker and pâtissier opened his first bakery in Maple Grove in November and now has opened the second Chez Arnaud in White Bear Lake. He speaks of importing special ovens from France, his successful search for local flour, butter and seasonal fruits to make French bread and pastries that have the authentic French taste. Barbara Redmond and Arnaud de Rambures are guests on tonight's program. Barbara, a noted designer, watercolorist of Paris and blogger(www.awomansparis) describes her descent into the lower level of the famous Poilâne Bakery to view the 17th century ovens still in use.   Download Listen Now Caryl Minnetti Dana Bogema DJs:  September
textAfterTable: Guest:  Barbara Redmond Title:  artist,designer blogger Topics:  Her visit and description of the 17th century bakery still in operation Guest:  Arnaud de Rambures Title:  owner of 2 new French bakeries:Chez Arnaud in Maple Grove White Bear Lake Topics:  the various breads, pastries, sorbets, quiches and other specialties available Program Archives July 2015 (4) June 2015 (7) May 2015 (5)
